hero.headline: Your Trusted Chinese Interpreter & Sourcing Partner in Bangladesh

aboutTeam.intro1: I am E. Shahadat, a professional Chinese Interpreter and Sourcing Expert with over 10 years of experience bridging communication gaps in Bangladesh's industrial sectors.
aboutTeam.intro2: Based on a passion for Chinese culture and specialized training, I lead a team of certified interpreters dedicated to your business success.
aboutTeam.teamDesc: Professional interpretation in Japanese, Korean, and Vietnamese.

1.review: Dovasi helped us communicate fluently during our machinery visit to Dhaka. Their expert Chinese interpreter bridge the gap flawlessly.
1.name: Li Wei

2.review: The onsite interpretation provided by Dovasi was exceptional. It saved us months of negotiation time with our Chinese partners.
2.name: Kazi Ariful

3.review: Accurate document translation for our joint venture contracts. They understand both the language and the technical business terminology.
3.name: Chen Hao

qrcodes.desc: Need a 24/7 instant response? Scan our QR codes for direct communication with Dovasi Co-Operation. We're available on WeChat and WhatsApp for all your urgent interpretation and sourcing needs.

cta.hireDesc: Hire our certified interpreters for your next business delegation, factory visit or technical training.
cta.consultDesc: Get professional guidance on Bangladesh trade policies, factory verification, and legally certified documentations.
